This is game is super fun! If u have the money to buy this game its well worth it! The campaign itself is quite long and has a great storyline and challenging tests to do. After u finish the campaign go play other peoples levels or make your own with the puzzle creator! Or if a friend has it, go play co op its has some great co op levels to play! So yes I LOVE THIS GAME! Totally Reccomended

made my brain go woosh. so crazy at colours, im colorbrind normally but this game fixed me right up! now i can see beautiful women the way they are meant to be seen. 

(Oranges and Blues on women turn me on now???? idk)

but anyways, this game showcases the true meaning of companionsip and coopration because its tough to do when your partner is a bad a co-op! He got scared and left and idk why he wasn't even doing it but w/e man its cool. This game is chill after a beer or so, great for relaxation me and my friend (listed above, Stewart)decided to get drunk and play well we werent really drunk we just pretended but it was still fun. Like buster and the juice anyways, Like fake drunk.

cool game
A Valve masterpiece.

Awesome game. But I need to look up guides on how to beat the stages with the grey goo. Those where so picky in how it wanted you to beat the game that I had no fun solving the puzzles and just looked up a guide to skip the stage entirely. But the co-op, that is some good stuff.

Just as good as the original portal with a more diverse story line and a lot of new features. The new co-op mode was a great addition to the game and even that has a great story line. The second half of the game is my favorite part of the game.
I think that this game is vastly overrated and it's the worst game of the 21st century. I would rather play something cool like Minecraft or Cooking Mama.

10/10. The first game was already great, and this definitely surpassed it. I will probably replay single player because it was so captivating, and the story was so interesting. The voice acting was also great and I loved the scenery. Everything was incredibly detailed, even where it didn't need to be. Anyway, play it if you haven't lol.

Portal 2 the amazing sequel to an already awesome game. The first Portal was good, compared to Portal 2, Portal 1 it's just a test, and Portal 2 it's the mother of al tests. This game, has a awesome story, cool characters, and the same great mechanics as Portal 1, GLaDOS it's better than ever, I love her (I know robors don't have a gender but we can say she is a female because of SPOILERS ...................................Caroline bla bla bla)  so much, Wheatley, not the best talking robot ever, but I love him, and hate him. But the best character it's.... CAVE JOHNSON, best quotes, best dialogue, best everything. Chell it's still a silent character but come on she is cool and awesome

The tests in this game are more complex, and it requieres more logic, the co-op it's great and fun, but also a little to easy.
The gameplay well obviously amazing. The soundtrack, the best I have ever listened in a game, I also play this soundtrack some times when I play TF2 co-op XD.
The graphics incredible.
I hardly find anything bad with this game so let's just finish this.
Portal 2 it's one of the greatest games ever, Everybody should play it well that's my opinion about Portal 2. LOVE IT

Despu√©s de pasarte Portal 1, que m√°s ganas que pasarte Portal 2 y vale lo que merece y m√°s, un juego muy entretenido, jugablemente muy bueno y contiene multijugador para jugar con amigos, a dem√°s de tener mapas creados por la comunidad. Un muy buen juego, igual que Portal 1.
MUito divertido o multiplayer
Awesome game. Very clever!!
An amazing FPS puzzle game that is highly entertaining and challenging.

I've had Portal 2 for 2 years or so and I never really played it. Recently, I got back into it and started realizing how fun it was. I quickly beat the singleplayer and then soon after, I beat the multiplayer part. It's a game that you have to use the brain. (I know brains are hard to use) 15/10 would play again.

101/1 
Would escape aperture with an extreamly awesome back story with hilarious characters and a awesome atmosphere while shooting portals everywhere with hard puzzles again.

Portal 2 is, of course, a FPS puzzle game where you use orange and blue portals to traverse the maps.  Portal 2 has a bit more depth than the original and keeps you entertained with all the insults you receive from the robotic maniac trying to kill you the whole time.  Fantastic game.  10/10
Great game :D

The most interesting and funniest game I have ever played.

Probably the best valve game.


11/10
This game, wow. I just can't describe it. The story is simple, but moving. This game made me love the all the puzzles. It was an amazing game.

This is my favorite Video Game ever! I love the Mystery, the sense of Humor, the Charecters, and the two EPIC Plot Twists. Overall, this game is MUCH better then Portal 1 because of the longer Chapters, more Charecter Interaction, making a not as boring Testing expierence. I reccomend this game for people who like First- Person Shooters, (Although you dont actually shoot Bullets, just Portals, Obviously) and for Poeple who like Comedy and Adventure.

Just buy it!
Do it!
Do it NAOW!!!!!

If you've played the first one, then you will love this great addition to the Portal series. It's just as difficult as the first one and that challenge keeps bringing me back for more. Even better is when you catch it on sale. Have fun in Aperture Labs!
BUY IT. NOW.

If you have lived in the 21st Century. You've heard of the Portal franchise. The second installment of the franchise did its job in surpassing expectation. Want hours of gameplay and mind-boggling wormhole physics, alongside two of the greatest artificial intelligences in video game history; with jokes and cruel phrases to keep you going? Portal 2 in a nutshell.

Why should you buy this game?
"Because I'm a Potato" - GLaDOS

Portal 2 is a worth while game and deserves twenty dollars for its great gameplay, replay value and multiplayer. I do wish that they make a third in the series although Valve has stuck with two in most all of their franchises.
Definitely the best game I have ever played, the story is great, voice acting is the best ever. Just a genuinly really good purchase, I highly recommend this no matter what games you're into.
